member.name: T:FbError
member.summary: Collects information relevant to a warning or error returned by Firebird. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.para: This class is created by the Firebird .NET Data Provider when an error occurs. An instance of FbError is created and managed by the FbException class.

member.summary: Gets the severity level of the error returned from Firebird.
member.value: A value from 1 to 25 that indicates the severity level of the error. The default is 0.

member.name: P:LineNumber
member.summary: Bets the line number within the DSQL command batch or stored procedure that contains the error.
member.value: The line number within the DSQL command batch or stored procedure that contains the error.
member.remarks: Line numbering starts at 1. If the value is 0, the line number is not applicable.
